name: a garden of souls
description:
a young, lost soul is trapped in a mystical garden.

there are 2 possible endings.

playtime of about 5-10 minutes.

control game with arrow keys.

//

a garden of souls is a short puzzle game that relies heavily on dialogue, the ending you get is reliant on how you interact with the environment. 

this is the first game I’ve completed ever.

made for the 5-Years-O-Bitsy Jam

recommended listening: [link]
